testcase.name: We make a move by posting a word to the with the /api/game/{id}/word end-point
We create a new game with the /api/game end-point
We can try to ask for the answer by sending a GET to /api/game/{id}/answer
We can get the current game result by sending a GET to /api/game/{id}/result
At any time we can check the current state of the game by sending a GET to /api/game/{id}/history
